publicationVenue.name: International Conference on Dependable Systems, Services and Technologies
alternate_names: Int Conf Dependable Syst Serv Technol

title: Cloud system ArcGIS online as a managerial decision-making tool in agricultural production
abstract: Agriculture has always contributed to the development and accelerated implementation of geoinformation technologies in the section of national economy and the economy of the country as a whole. Official release of the ESRI product — ArcGIS Online opens up new opportunities for “cloud” GIS infrastructure for agribusiness in the area of management decision-making. The publication of vector and raster materials in the form of data services is called to increase the efficiency of making managerial decisions, which in turn should provide a solution to a wide range of tasks for scientifically-based commodity agricultural production implementing.
venue: International Conference on Dependable Systems, Services and Technologies

journal.name: 2018 IEEE 9th International Conference on Dependable Systems, Services and Technologies (DESSERT)
